channel.title: Systems Administration on dscobol
channel.description: Recent content in Systems Administration on dscobol

item.title: Add a 3350 DASD Volume to MVS-TK5
item.description:
If you installed MVS-TK5 per the instructions, you should run set_console_mode as you will need to manually start MVS-TK5 and use the Hercules console.

To use the Hercules utilities:

Run uname -m to determine the architecture of your computer.

On this Raspberry Pi, it is aarch64.

In .bashrc (or .zshrc or whatever you are using) add the line:

export LD_LIBRARY_PATH="/lib:/usr/lib:/usr/local/lib:/mvs-tk5/hercules/linux/aarch64/lib"

and then source the .bashrc file.

With System NOT Running

Pick a device size and name

NOTE: VOLID must be 6 chars or less.
